Type.Name: GrabStatus

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed GrabStatus extends System.Enum

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: Returned by and to indicate success or the reason for the failure of the grab event.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.GrabStatus AlreadyGrabbed = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The resource is actively grabbed by another client.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.GrabStatus Frozen = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The resource is frozen by an active grab of another client.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.GrabStatus InvalidTime = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The resource was grabbed more recently than the specified time.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.GrabStatus NotViewable = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The grab window or the confine_to window are not viewable.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.GrabStatus Success = int32(0)
